descriptions.description: This library implements a wrapper for dlfcn, as specified in POSIX and SUS, around the dynamic link library functions found in the Windows API.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=dlfcn-win32 PACKAGE_VERSION=r19 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.bz2 #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
